name: places/ChIJwd316L5ZwokRfXPQXbQycUM
formattedAddress: 325 W 16th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: 325 W 16th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

editorialSummary.text: Sleek showroom with premium kitchen & bath materials such as cabinets, counters & fixtures.

originalText.text: I had an excellent experience  with Urban Homes.  They did an fantastic job helping me design my admittedly tiny Manhattan kitchen to maximize visual appeal and space utilization.  They also stand behind their work.  When a minor issue surfaced some time after the installation, Jacob was 100% responsive and sent out a small team (Manny and Jose)to address my concerns.  I recommend them highly.

text.text: I had an excellent experience  with Urban Homes.  They did an fantastic job helping me design my admittedly tiny Manhattan kitchen to maximize visual appeal and space utilization.  They also stand behind their work.  When a minor issue surfaced some time after the installation, Jacob was 100% responsive and sent out a small team (Manny and Jose)to address my concerns.  I recommend them highly.

originalText.text:
I have had the pleasure of working with Urban Homes on a number of projects, and they have consistently delivered excellent service and high quality product every time.

Urban Homes provides extreme attention to detail, regardless of project size. We recently collaborated on a large kitchen for a single-family home with custom finishes, careful scribes and perfect appliance fitment. On another project, they provided over 220 kitchens and vanities for a large multi-family building -- and installed every component flawlessly and on-schedule.

I cannot recommend Jacob, Harriet and the entire team more highly and look forward to working with them on future projects.

originalText.text:
I am an architect, and we work with some of the best in the industry.  I have been working with Urban Homes for almost a decade now.  They always deliver an exquisite project for us, with the highest quality kitchens.

It's easy to work with the design team, and my clients are always super happy.   I can easily recommend them to anybody, from a home owner, architect, interior designer or developer.

originalText.text: We bought Astor Cucine kitchen from Urban Homes but had our own contractor install the kitchen as we live away from the city.  The kitchen is beautiful and it was pleasure to work with Michelle in designing the kitchen and finding exactly what we wanted.  However, if you are working with your own contractor be aware that the (limited) instructions how to install the kitchen are only provided in Italian and you need a very experienced contractor to make it work. Additionally, if some shortcomings are pointed out to the management of Urban Homes they become very defensive.

originalText.text:
My wife and I were recommended to Michelle at Urban Homes thru a friend that was in the process of renovating her apartment and had just placed an order for kitchen cabinets.

We shopped around and looked at other cabinets and showrooms but ultimately decided on Urban Homes for 2 reasons.
1 - For our kitchen, we liked the the style and design of the cabinets at Urban Homes better than other places
2 - The service that Urban Homes, especially Michelle who we dealt exclusively with, was way beyond that of any place we had went to.

Michelle spent more time with us than any other showroom we visited, answered numerous phone calls and e-mails in an extremely prompt manner, and she even volunteered to come to tile showrooms to help pick out a matching floor, backsplash, and countertop.  We were impressed with her knowledge of the products and really appreciated her taking her time with us - understanding that is a big decision and purchase and gave us multiple quotes upon request.  One other thing that was great was that they facilitated our appliance purchase for us, getting us a better price and coordinating delivery to coincide with the cabinets being delivered.

As for the product itself - we could not be more happy with our cabinets and have not had any problems.  We had our own contractor install the cabinets and he did not seem to have any problems during the process (Michelle said that at any point he could call their installers and ask any question that he may have).

Overall, we have no complaints about our cabinets or the service provided by Michelle and the team at Urban Homes and would highly recommend them to anyone that is looking to renovate their kitchen.
